skills.name: Living Edge
skills.description: [SP: 12][CD: 25s] Wielder gains 20.0% Crit Rate and 50.0% Crit DMG for 10s. If wielder is below 50% HP, then heal 20.0 HP per 0.5s.

skills.name: Thorny Briar
skills.description: Charged ATK deals another 120% ATK of Physical DMG on enemies. This effect triggers once every 1s. Wielder gains Ignore Interrupt and 30.0% DEF.
